===Etymology===
* '''[[w:Warring States Period|Warring States Period]]:''' [[w:Zuo Qiuming|Zuo Qiuming]], ''[[w:Zuo Zhuan|Zuo Zhuan]]'' ([[:zh:s:春秋左氏傳/襄公#襄公二十一年|春秋左氏傳˙襄公二十一年]])
*: [[然]][[二]][[子]][[者]]，[[譬]][[於]][[禽獸]]，[[臣]]'''食'''[[其]]'''肉'''[[而]]'''寢'''[[處]][[其]]'''皮'''[[矣]]。
*:: ''As to those two, they are like beasts, whose '''flesh I will eat, and then sleep upon their skins'''. ([[w:James Legge|James Legge]])''
